Method Detail

findStart

private int findStart(java.util.List<Gene> list,
                      int value,
                      int indexStart,
                      int indexStop)
Recursive and dichotomic search algorithm.

Parameters:
list - List in which the search is performed.
value - Searched value.
indexStart - Start index where to look for the value.
indexStop - Stop index where to look for the value.
Returns:
The index of a gene with a position start equals to value. Index of the first gene with a start position superior to value if nothing found.

findStop

private int findStop(java.util.List<Gene> list,
                     int value,
                     int indexStart,
                     int indexStop)
Recursive and dichotomic search algorithm.

Parameters:
list - List in which the search is performed.
value - Searched value.
indexStart - Start index where to look for the value.
indexStop - Stop index where to look for the value.
Returns:
The index of a gene with a position stop equals to value. Index of the first gene with a stop position superior to value if nothing found.

Parameters:
position - a position on the genome

search

public Gene search(java.lang.String name)
Returns the first gene of the gene list called name. Returns null if there is no gene with this name.

Parameters:
name - name of the gene
Returns:
A gene called name. Return null if not found.
